name: Battle of Somme
description:
Welcome to World War. Take command of a soldier, and lead your units to victory.

X to shoot, Z to grenade. Hold A to open the spawn menu and X to select units in the menu to spawn. Arrow keys to move.

Made in GameMaker: Studio

Credits:

Programmer: Zyuxis

Art: Killjoy

Sound: A dead rat I found under my bed
